sentences.sContent: If you have a recurrence, talk to your doctor about getting a new biopsy before settling on treatment.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have a recurrence, talk to your doctor about getting a new biopsy before settling on treatment.
sentences.sCn: 如果你存在复发，那么跟你的医生谈论在制定治疗方案前再做一次新的活检。

sentences.sContent: As someoneundergoing treatment for cancer, I wanted to do whatever I could to stop it inits tracks and prevent a recurrence.
sentences.sContent_eng: As someoneundergoing treatment for cancer, I wanted to do whatever I could to stop it inits tracks and prevent a recurrence.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个正在接受癌症治疗的人，我想要做我所能做的一切来阻止它的进程和防止复发。

sentences.sContent: If, after treatment and after those five years, there is no recurrence of the cancer, then the patient is declared cured.
sentences.sContent_eng: If, after treatment and after those five years, there is no recurrence of the cancer, then the patient is declared cured.
sentences.sCn: 癌症的一个康复标准是：如果在经过治疗后五年病情没有复发，那么这个患者我们可以说他是得到了康复。
